org.springframework.boot.task.ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder

Packages that use ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder
Package
Description
org.springframework.boot.task
Utilities and classes related to task execution and scheduling.

    Set whether to accept further tasks after the application context close phase has begun.

    Set whether core threads are allowed to time out.
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder.awaitTermination(boolean awaitTermination)
    Set whether the executor should wait for scheduled tasks to complete on shutdown, not interrupting running tasks and executing all tasks in the queue.
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder.awaitTerminationPeriod(@Nullable Duration awaitTerminationPeriod)
    Set the maximum time the executor is supposed to block on shutdown.

    Set the core number of threads.

    Set the time limit for which threads may remain idle before being terminated.
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder

    Set the maximum allowed number of threads.
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder.queueCapacity(int queueCapacity)
    Set the capacity of the queue.
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskExecutorBuilder.taskDecorator(@Nullable TaskDecorator taskDecorator)
    Set the TaskDecorator to use or null to not use any.
